DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective study evaluate safety efficacy clobetasol propionate spray versus vehicle spray management moderate severe plaque psoriasis scalp .
DOC.brief_title: Clobetasol Propionate Spray Versus Vehicle Spray Management Moderate Severe Plaque Psoriasis Scalp
DOC.criteria: Subjects diagnosis moderate severe plaque psoriasis scalp Subjects need systemic treatment body psoriasis Subjects surface area involvement large ( > 20 % Body Surface Area [ BSA ] ) would require 50 gram per week study product
